Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.oranda.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class - Indicates a player which could be human-controlled or ai-controlled
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    MMKH
